ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: The eye is not  a rare drop I think you were completly unlucky I and some friends did the quest and we got the eye s in about 10 min of hunting each. Naeeldar
ygData.messageBody:
The eye is not a rare drop I think you were completly unlucky I and some
friends did the quest and we got the eye's in about 10 min of hunting each.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 46th Level

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 10:21 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>This weekend, I finally finished the necro quests in the temple, by getting
>the Harvester...this item was by far the hardest of the 4 available. Upon
>turning in a shadowed scythe to Vurgo, he hands you a note and asks for a
>shadowed knife from the goblin headmaster in OOT, this was relatively
>simple, the headmaster spawns on the far side of oracle island. His spot
is
>on the left of a hut that spawns 2 goblins, once I found him he seemed to
be
>a pretty common spawn. The next item I needed was a mortuary fungus eye
>from unrest. This was a pain in the ass...I got to unrest at about 2am CST
>and there were a total of 6 people there and I was the highest level by 15
>(39) Needless to say...I was the only one going anywhere near the basement
>:( my suggestion unless you're level 50 is to go during peak hours when
the
>house is totally camped and bring a couple friends anyway. The fungus
spawn
>pretty much near the end of the basement, near the ghost, in a couple pit
>traps in the floor. The eye is a rare drop, and it took me a good 3 hrs to
>get one...maybe I was just unlucky. As far as shadowed men go, once you
hit
>level 36 or so, you can generally pull singles from the camp, and once you
>hit 39, your pet can solo them ;) (one at a time of course) unless it's a
>cleric...then he might need a little nuke push at the end.
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
